data.message: Being trying to do this but no where to enter code on site keeps going round in circles can anyone help please :(

replies.message: Hi Marie, we're sorry to hear you've been having trouble trying to enter your code. You select your dream destination first and and then follow the steps on the website to be able to enter your code. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) 9am - 6pm. Thanks
Hi sorry about this but i have done that when i click on the destination it just comes up with a red bar saying "OK" and that is it no Code no details nothing very frustrating :(

Hi Marie, we've become aware of a website error when signing into the promotional website via Facebook. We're currently working hard to get this fixed, sorry for any inconvenience caused. In the meantime, please log out if you're logged/signed in. Select the destination first and then log in when prompted on the destination page. Hope this helps
